line_1: The Words of Truth; but ev'ry Liar
line_2: That burns with Brimstone and with Fire.

line_1: Nor kill with frown severe one harmless Lyar.
line_2: Yet still she hopes, by Candour's rules you 'll try her,

line_1: And fain wad mak ilk wrinkle liar.
line_2: I saw him burn it i' the fire;

line_1: Will, likewise, prove that man a liar
line_2: The seventh and tenth of Nehemiah
